00021 using System;
00022 using System.IO;
00023 using System.Threading;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.Network;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 
00033 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00035     public class FileSender : FileInfo {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PUBLIC Events
00038         // ============================================
00040         public ExceptionEventHandler EndSend = null;
00042         public BlankEventHandler SendedPart = null;
00043 
00044         // ============================================
00045         // PUBLIC Consts
00046         // ============================================
00048         public const uint ChunkSize = 5120; // 5120 it's ok
00049 
00050         // ============================================
00051         // PRIVATE Members
00052         // ============================================
00053         private int sendedPercent = 0;
00054         private Thread thread = null;
00055         private bool endSend = false;
00056         private long sendedSize = 0;
00057 
00058         // ============================================
00059         // PUBLIC Constructors
00060         // ============================================
00062         public FileSender (ulong id) : base(id) {
00063         }
00064 
00066         public FileSender (ulong id, PeerSocket peer, string path) :
00067             base(id, peer, path, null)
00068         {
00069             System.IO.FileInfo fileInfo = new System.IO.FileInfo(path);
00070 
00071             string sharedFolder = Paths.UserSharedDirectory(MyInfo.Name);
00072             if (MyDiskName.StartsWith(sharedFolder) == true) {              
00073                 Name = MyDiskName.Substring(sharedFolder.Length);
00074             } else {
00075                 Name = fileInfo.Name;
00076             }
00077             Size = fileInfo.Length;
00078         }
00079 
00081         ~FileSender() {
00082             Abort();
00083         }
00084 
00085         // ============================================
00086         // PUBLIC Methods
00087         // ============================================
00089         public void Ask() {
00090             // XmlRequest
00091             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00092             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "ask";
00093             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00094             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", Id);
00095             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("size", Size);
00096             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("name", Name);
00097 
00098             // Send To Peer
00099             if (Peer != null) Peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00100         }
00101 
00103         public override void Abort() {
00104             if (thread != null) {
00105                 if (endSend == false && thread.IsAlive == true) {
00106                     thread.Abort();
00107                 }
00108                 thread = null;
00109             }
00110         }
00111 
00113         public void Abort (Exception exception) {
00114             try {
00115                 // Send Abort Message + Error
00116                 endSend = true;
00117                 AbortSendFile(exception.Message);
00118 
00119                 // Raise End Send Event
00120                 if (EndSend != null) EndSend(this, exception);
00121 
00122                 // Abort Thread
00123                 if (thread != null) {
00124                     if (thread.IsAlive == true) thread.Abort();
00125                     thread = null;
00126                 }
00127             } catch (Exception e) {
00128                 Debug.Log("FileSender.Abort(): {0}", e.Message);
00129             }
00130         }
00131 
00133         public void Start() {
00134             thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(StartSendingFile));
00135             thread.Name = "Send File " + Name;
00136             thread.Start();
00137         }
00138 
00139         // ============================================
00140         // PUBLIC (Protocol) Methods
00141         // ============================================
00143         public void SendFilePart (byte[] data, uint npart) {
00144             // Base64 Convert
00145             string b64data = Convert.ToBase64String(data);
00146 
00147             // XmlRequest
00148             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00149             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "snd";
00150             xmlRequest.BodyText = b64data;
00151             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00152             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", Id);
00153             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("part", npart);
00154 
00155             // Add md5sum
00156             xmlRequest.AddAttributeMd5Sum();
00157 
00158             // Send To Peer
00159             if (Peer != null) Peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00160         }
00161 
00163         public void SendFileStart() {
00164             // XmlRequest
00165             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00166             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "snd-start";
00167             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00168             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", Id);
00169             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("size", Size);
00170             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("name", Name);
00171 
00172             // Send To Peer
00173             if (Peer != null) Peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00174         }
00175 
00177         public void SendFileEnd() {
00178             // XmlRequest
00179             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00180             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "snd-end";
00181             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00182             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", Id);
00183 
00184             // Send To Peer
00185             if (Peer != null) Peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00186         }
00187 
00189         public void AbortSendFile() {
00190             AbortSendFile(null);
00191         }
00192 
00194         public void AbortSendFile (string msgerror) {
00195             // XmlRequest
00196             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00197             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "snd-abort";
00198             if (msgerror != null)
00199                 xmlRequest.BodyText = "Sending Error: " + msgerror;
00200             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("what", "file");
00201             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("id", Id);
00202 
00203             // Send To Peer
00204             if (Peer != null) Peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00205         }
00206 
00207 
00208         // ============================================
00209         // PRIVATE (Thread) Methods
00210         // ============================================
00211         private void StartSendingFile() {
00212             try {
00213                 SendFileStart();
00214                 Thread.Sleep(1500);
00215                 if (Size < 1048576) {
00216                     // Less Then 1M
00217                     SendSmallFileParts();
00218                 } else {
00219                     SendBigFileParts();
00220                 }
00221                 Thread.Sleep(1500);
00222                 SendFileEnd();
00223                 endSend = true;
00224 
00225                 // Raise End Send Event
00226                 if (EndSend != null) EndSend(this, null);
00227             } catch (ThreadAbortException) {
00228                 if (endSend == true) return;
00229 
00230                 // Send Abort Message
00231                 endSend = true;
00232                 AbortSendFile();
00233 
00234                 // Raise End Send Event
00235                 if (EndSend != null) EndSend(this, null);
00236             } catch (Exception e) {
00237                 if (endSend == true) return;
00238 
00239                 // Send Abort Message + Error
00240                 endSend = true;
00241                 AbortSendFile(e.Message);
00242 
00243                 // Raise End Send Event
00244                 if (EndSend != null) EndSend(this, e);
00245             }
00246         }
00247 
00248         // Split and Send "Small File" In Parts of ChunkSize
00249         private void SendSmallFileParts() {
00250             // Initialize & Read Entire File
00251             byte[] fileContent = FileUtils.ReadEntireFile(MyDiskName);
00252             Size = fileContent.Length;
00253 
00254             uint part = 0;
00255             while (fileContent != null) {
00256                 long length = ChunkSize;
00257                 if (fileContent.Length < ChunkSize)
00258                     length = fileContent.Length;
00259                 
00260                 // Copy first 'ChunkSize` block and Send it
00261                 byte[] buffer = new byte[length];
00262                 Array.Copy(fileContent, buffer, length);
00263 
00264                 // Send File Part
00265                 SendFilePart(buffer, part++);
00266 
00267                 // Sended File Part
00268                 sendedSize = Size - fileContent.Length;
00269                 sendedPercent = (int) ((sendedSize / (double) Size) * 100);
00270 
00271                 // Raise Sended Part Event
00272                 if (SendedPart != null) SendedPart(this);
00273                 Thread.Sleep(40);
00274 
00275                 // Remove Sended Part From File
00276                 if (fileContent.Length > ChunkSize) {
00277                     buffer = fileContent;
00278                     length = buffer.Length - ChunkSize;
00279                     fileContent = new byte[length];
00280                     Array.Copy(buffer, ChunkSize, fileContent, 0, length);
00281                 } else {
00282                     fileContent = null;
00283                 }
00284             }
00285         }
00286 
00287         // Split and Send "Big File" In Parts of ChunkSize
00288         private void SendBigFileParts() {
00289             BufferedStream stream = null;
00290 
00291             try {
00292                 uint totalParts = (uint) Size / FileSender.ChunkSize;
00293 
00294                 stream = new BufferedStream(File.OpenRead(MyDiskName));
00295                 byte[] buffer = new byte[FileSender.ChunkSize];
00296 
00297                 for (uint part=0; part < totalParts; part++) {
00298                     stream.Seek((int)(part * FileSender.ChunkSize), SeekOrigin.Begin);
00299                     stream.Read(buffer, 0, (int) FileSender.ChunkSize);
00300 
00301                     // Send File Part
00302                     SendFilePart(buffer, part);
00303 
00304                     // Sended File Part
00305                     sendedSize = part * FileSender.ChunkSize;
00306                     sendedPercent = (int) ((sendedSize / (double) Size) * 100);
00307 
00308                     // Raise Sended Part Event
00309                     if (SendedPart != null) SendedPart(this);
00310                     Thread.Sleep(40);
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 // Send Last Block
00314                 if ((Size % FileSender.ChunkSize) != 0) {
00315                     int startPos = (int) (totalParts * FileSender.ChunkSize);
00316                     stream.Seek(startPos, SeekOrigin.Begin);
00317 
00318                     byte[] lastBuffer = new byte[(int) Size - startPos];
00319                     stream.Read(lastBuffer, 0, lastBuffer.Length);
00320 
00321                     // Send File Part
00322                     SendFilePart(lastBuffer, totalParts);
00323 
00324                     // Sended File Part
00325                     sendedSize = Size;
00326                     sendedPercent = 100;
00327 
00328                     // Raise Sended Part Event
00329                     if (SendedPart != null) SendedPart(this);
00330                 }
00331             } catch (Exception e) {
00332                 Abort(e);
00333             } finally {
00334                 if (stream != null) {
00335                     stream.Close();
00336                     stream = null;
00337                 }
00338             }
00339         }
00340 
00341         // ============================================
00342         // PUBLIC Properties
00343         // ============================================
00345         public long SendedSize {
00346             get { return(this.sendedSize); }
00347         }
00348 
00350         public int SendedPercent {
00351             get { return(this.sendedPercent); }
00352         }
00353     }
00354 }
